RELEASE NOTES: 
    
  NO INSTALL/UNRAR & PLAY/ UPDATE PATCHED to v. 1.1

   World has always been  divided into  two sides ? black and  white, day and 
   night, Light and Darkness. An ancient agreement guards the balance between 
   Light and Darkness. But there  should  be someone to guard the Agreement.
      
   Welcome to the Night Watch!  As your power will grow with the experience, 
   you will be able to choose one  specialization  out of three.  You can be 
   Shapeshifter and turn into an animal ? your significant physical strength 
   will be a great weapon in close combat. You can choose to be an Enchanter 
   and be able to turn usual items into magical artifacts. Or you can become 
   a Mage  and learn  many of  different mighty  spells. But no matter which
   specialization you choose, you can also rely on your team-mates.
